name: Among Us - Impostor Server
author: josdekurk@gmail.com
description:
Impostor is one of the first Among Us private servers, written in C#.

The latest version supported is 2022.4.19, both desktop and mobile.

There are no special features at this moment, the goal is aiming to be as close as possible to the real server, for now. In a later stage, making modifications to game logic by modifying GameData packets can be looked at.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install wget curl jq unzip tar redis-server file ca-certificates apt-utils
GITHUB_PACKAGE=Impostor/Impostor
export HOME=/mnt/server
cd $HOME

ARCH=$([[ "$(uname -m)" == "x86_64" ]] && echo "x64" || echo "arm64")
## get release info and download links

LATEST_RELEASE=$(curl -L -s -H 'Accept: application/json' https://github.com/${GITHUB_PACKAGE}/releases/latest)
echo -e "Latest release is $LATEST_RELEASE"
LATEST_VERSION_TAG=$(echo $LATEST_RELEASE | sed -e 's/.*"tag_name":"\([^"]*\)".*/\1/')

# Remove the first letter v from the version tag that is not present in the download URL
LATEST_VERSION=$(echo $LATEST_VERSION_TAG | cut -c 2-)

if [ -z "${VERSION}" ] || [ "${VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_LINK="https://github.com/${GITHUB_PACKAGE}/releases/download/v$LATEST_VERSION/Impostor-Server_${LATEST_VERSION}_linux-${ARCH}.tar.gz"
else 
    DOWNLOAD_LINK="https://github.com/${GITHUB_PACKAGE}/releases/download/v$VERSION/Impostor-Server_${VERSION}_linux-${ARCH}.tar.gz"
fi

echo -e "\nDownloading from $DOWNLOAD_LINK"
curl -L $DOWNLOAD_LINK -o Impostor-Server-linux.tar.gz

tar xvf Impostor-Server-linux.tar.gz
rm Impostor-Server-linux.tar.gz
chmod +x Impostor.Server

echo -e "\nInstall completed"
